hooks.command: test -f ~/.claude/skills/context-memory/scripts/db_save.py && { PROJ_NAME=$(basename "$PWD"); GIT_BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo ''); TOPICS="auto-save"; [ -n "$GIT_BRANCH" ] && TOPICS="$TOPICS,$GIT_BRANCH"; python ~/.claude/skills/context-memory/scripts/db_save.py --auto --session-id "auto-$(date +%s)" --project-path "$PWD" --brief "Auto-saved session: $PROJ_NAME" --topics "$TOPICS"; } || true
